40 : CommunicationBuffer(size, doubleBuffer)

48void SendBuffer::squeeze()
49{
50 for (RawSendBuffer & buffer : getBuffers()) {
51 buffer.squeeze();
52 }
53}
54
62void SendBuffer::write(const char *data, std::size_t size)
63{
64 getFront().write(data, size);
65}
